#include <stdio.h>

int fact(const int a) {
  int r;
  if(a == 1) r = 1;
  else r = a*fact(a-1);
  return r;
}

int main() {
  int t, n, m;
  scanf("%d", &t);
  while(t--) {
    scanf("%d%d", &m, &n);
    if(m*n == 0) printf("%d\n", 1);
    printf("%d\n", fact(n+m)/(fact(n)*fact(m)));
  }
  return 0;
}
